data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Baja California Sur, Mexico to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Baja California Sur, Mexico
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Baja California Sur, Mexico. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 49,838 believers in Baja California Sur to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Baja California Sur, Mexico to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Huichol people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Huichol people.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Baja California Sur, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Baja California Sur who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, remind your church in Baja California Sur, Mexico that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.
